projects.name: StreetCode
projects.short: A lightweight blogging platform built from scratch to explore full-stack development. Entity Framework for data, SQLite backend. Simple, clean, and functional publishing workflow.

projects.name: Link Convert
projects.short: Discord Bot that converts apple music link to spotify link and vice versa

projects.name: SportsOracle
projects.short: Real-time sports trend analyzer that scrapes Reddit & ESPN, clusters discussions, and summarizes topics with transformer models in an interactive dashboard.
